name: North American Aviation F-86F Sabre
description:
The North American F-86 Sabre, sometimes called the Sabrejet, is a transonic jet fighter aircraft. 

Produced by North American Aviation, the Sabre is best known as the United States' first swept-wing fighter that could counter the swept-wing Soviet MiG-15 in high-speed dogfights in the skies of the Korean War.
